gurmukhi: khUM dys ky Bys ky Drm Dwmo ] khUM rwj ky swj ky bwj ] qwmy ]16]106]
transliteration: Kahoon Des Ke Bhes Ke Dharam Dhaame|| Kahoon Raaj Ke Saaj Ke Baaj Taame||16||106||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the abode of virtues of various guises of the county. Somewhere Thou art manifesting the mode of Tamas in a kingly mood. 16.106.

gurmukhi: khUM ACR ky pCR ky is`D swDy ] khUM is`D ky bu`iD ky biR`D lwDy ]
transliteration: Kahoon Achhra Ke Pachhra Ke Siddh Saadhe|| Kahoon Siddh Ke Buddh(i) Ke Briddh Laadhe||
translation: Somewhere Thou art practicing for the realisation of powers through the medium of learning and science. Somewhere Thou art searching the secrets of Powers and Intellect.

gurmukhi: khUM AMg ky rMg ky sMig dyKy ] khUM jMg ky rMg ky rMg pyKy ]17]107]
transliteration: Kahoon An Ke Ran Ke San(i) Dekhe|| Kahoon Jan Ke Ran Ke Ran Pekhe||17||107||
translation: Somewhere Thou art seen in profound love of woman. Somewhere Thou art seen in excitement of warfare. 17.107.

gurmukhi: khUM Drm ky krm ky hrm jwny ] krUM Drm ky krm ky Brm mwny ]
transliteration: Kahoon Dharam Ke Karam Ke Haram Jaane|| Kahoon Dharam Ke Karam Ke Bharam Maane||
translation: Somewhere Thou art considered as the abode of the acts of piety. Somewhere Thou acceptest the ritualistic discipline as illusion.

gurmukhi: khUM cwr cystw khUM icqR rUpM ] khUM prm pRgXw khUM srb BUpM ]18]108]
transliteration: Kahoon Chaar Chestaa Kahoon Chitra Roopan|| Kahoon Param Pragyaa Kahoon Sarab Bhoopan||18||108||
translation: Somewhere Thou makest grand efforts and somewhere Thou lookest like a picture. Somewhere Thou art embodiment of fime intellect and somewhere Thou art the Sovereign of all.18.108.

gurmukhi: khUM nyh gRyhM khUM dyh doKM ] khUM AOKDI rog ky sok soKM ]
transliteration: Kahoon Neh Grehan Kahoon Deh Dokhan|| Kahoon Aoukhadhoo Rog Ke Sok Sokhan||
translation: Somewhere Thou art an eclipse of love and somewhere Thou art physical ailment. Somewhere Thou art the medicine, drying up the grief of malady.

gurmukhi: khUM dyv ibdXw khUM dYq bwnI ] khUM j`C gMDrb ikMnr khwnI ]19]109]
transliteration: Kahoon Dev Bidyaa Kahoon Dait Baanoo|| Kahoon Jachchh Gaddharab Kinnar Kahaanoo||19||109||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the learning of gods and somewhere Thou art the speech of demons. Somewhere Thou art the episode of Yaksha, Gandharva and Kinnar. 19.109.

gurmukhi: khUM rwjsI swqkI qwmsI ho ] khUM jog ibdXw Dry qwpsI ho ]
transliteration: Kahoon Raajasoo Satakoo Taamasoo Ho|| Kahoon Jog Bidyaa Ddare Taapasoo Ho||
translation: Somewhere Thou art Rajsic (full of activity), Sattvic (rhythmic) and Tamsic (full of morbidity). Somewhere Thou art an ascetic, practicing the learning of yoga.

gurmukhi: khUM rog hrqw khUM jog jugqM ] khUM BUim kI Bugq mY Brm BugqM ]20]110]
transliteration: Kahoon Rog Hartaa Kahoon Jog Jougadan|| Kahoon Bhoom(i) Koo Bhougad Mai Bharam Bhougadan||20||110||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the Remover of malady and somewhere Thou art cohesive with Yoga. Somewhere Thou art cohesive with Yoga. Somewhere Thou art deluded in enjoying the earthly victuals.20.110.

gurmukhi: khUM dyv kMinAw khUM dwnvI ho ] khUM j`C ibdXw Dry mwnvI ho ]
transliteration: Kahoon Dev Kanniaa Kahoon Daanavoo Daanavoo Ho|| Kahoon Jachchh Bidyaa Ddare Maanavoo Ho||
translation: Somewhere Thou art a daughter of gods and somewhere a daughter of demons. Somewhere a daughter of Yakshas, Vidyadhars and men.

gurmukhi: khUM rwjsI ho khUM rwj kMinAw ] khUM siRsit kI piRst kI irst pMinAw ]21]111]
transliteration: Kahoon Rajasoo Ho Kahoon Raaj Kanniaa Raaj Kanniaa|| Kahoon Sristtee Koo Prisat Koo Risat Panniaa||21||111||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the queen and somewhere Thou art the princess. Somewhere Thou art the superb daughter of the Nagas of netherworld. 21.111.

gurmukhi: khUM byd ib`idAw khUM ibEm bwnI ] khUM kok kI kwib k`KY khwnI ]
transliteration: Kahoon Bed Biddiaa Kahoon Biom Baanoo|| Kahoon Kok Koo Kaab(i) Katthai Kahaanoo||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the learning of Vedas and somewhere the voice of heaven. Somewhere Thu art the discourse and story of general poets.

gurmukhi: khUM AdR swrM khUM BdR rUpM ] khUM m`dR bwnI khUM iCdR srUpM ]22]112]
transliteration: Kahoon Adra Saaran Kahoon Bhadra Roopan|| Kahoon Maddra Baanoo Kahoon Chhidra Daroopan||22||112||
translation: Somewhere Thou art iron and somewhere Thou art splendid gold. Somewhere Thou art sweet speech and somewhere Thou art sweet speech and somewhere Thou art critical and fault finding. 22.112.

gurmukhi: khUM byd ibidAw khUM kwb rUpM ] khUM cystw cwir icqRM srUpM ]
transliteration: Kahoon Bed Bidiaa Kahoon Kaab Roopan|| Kahoon Chestaa Cdaar(i) Chitran Daroopan||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the learning of the Vedas and somewhere Thou art literature. Somewhere Thou makest superb effort and somewhere Thou lookest like a picture.
